basic.description: This course studies the physiological and biochemical interactions of animals with their respective environments. Emphasis on non-mammalian vertebrate and invertebrate systems.
basic.subject: PCB
basic.title: General and Comparative Animal Physiology

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites: BSC 2010, BSC 2010L, BSC 2011, BSC 2011L, CHM 1045, CHM 1045L, CHM 1046, CHM 1046L, and CHM 2210.
